entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblins are mentioned as having their own version of history.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and has a conversation with Hermione about giving the sword to the goblin.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is concerned about Harry's plan to give the sword to the goblin.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron has a positive reaction to Harry's plan.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as being taken by the goblin and potentially given back to him.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: The Horcruxes are mentioned as something that Harry wants to use the sword on.

entities.name: nurmengard
entities.description: Nurmengard is a location where Harry has been and remembers some words engraved over its gateway.

relationships.description: Harry plans to give the sword to the goblin after they help them get into the vault.
Harry has a conversation with Hermione about his plan to give the sword to the goblin.
